body.name: Personal Cooling Portable Neck Fans - USB Rechargeable,360 Free Rotation & Lower Noise Bladeless Battery Operated Design with 3 Speeds Duration 48 hrs, Small Neck Air Conditioner(Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 7 hrs 34 mins
features: 【USB Rechargeable & 3 Speed Wind】Portable fan, convenient to charge via computer, cell phone charger, power bank, laptops, etc. mini fan portable with a 4000 large-capacity battery, which increases the wind power and battery lifespan. Three levels of speed adjustment functions allow you to choose the air volume you like. The first speed can work for 19-21 hours, the second speed for 7-9 hours, and the third speed for 3-5hours.

【Cooling & Safe】Personal fan with 48 wind outlets and 60pcs twin-turbine fan blades, multiplied wind power and can quickly feel cool in 3s. Bladeless neck fans can be used safely by children and the elderly. And you don’t worry about getting your hair in. The neck fan will keep you cool always.

【Adjustable Gooseneck】The hanging neck fan is made of high-quality soft silica gel, the Angle can be adjusted at will, it can better fit the skin, it can effectively prevent sliding, it is flexible and not easy to break. In addition, it has the function of heat insulation, which can prevent the fan from working too long to produce heat and cause discomfort to the neck.

【Ultra-quiet & Durable】The cooling neck fan with noise reduction of around 25db brings quiet and cool breeze. This fan has a lot of power, but it weighs only 250grams and is not difficult to carry. Even if you wear it for a day, you won't feel exhausted.

【Comfortable & Fashion】Hands free portable neck fan was designed to look like a headphone, you can free your hands and have a fashion style. The wearable neck fan is lightweight and portable, you can take it anywhere. Can Be Suitable For Outdoor Sports, Indoor Exercises, Offices, Gym, Travelling, And Camping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps you cool!
reviews.reviewText: I have have this for a year I sleep with it on and it helps all night!! It is amazing with the hot flashes and helps all spring and summer battery life is outstanding definitely will buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome neckfan! Gets the job done!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this neckfan for my husband because we live in Alabama (super hot and humid from spring through fall) and he works in a manufacturing plant that has no a/c. He comes home everyday with his clothing soaking wet from sweat so I wanted to get something that could help keep him somewhat cool. He has loved having this thing. He works 8-10 hour shifts and if he keeps it on medium fan, it will last the whole shift or about 4 to 5 hours on high setting. He usually does keep it on high cause it's just so hot in there that he needs it to be on high to keep cool so he typically waits until mid-morning to turn it on and it will last from about 9 a.m. to 1:30-2:00 p.m. on high/full blast. He still comes home hot and sweaty but he said it absolutely makes a big difference and he's so happy I bought it for him. It isn't too loud, it's so lightweight he forgets he's wearing it most of the time, and the fans are protected/enclosed so it won't catch your hair or anything. Highly, highly recommend! I'm going to purchase a 2nd fan soon cause we'll be starting little league football and I'm gonna need it to make it through games and practices. lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great cooling, but a little small for larger folks
reviews.reviewText: I have a medical condition that doesn't allow me to be out in the heat for extended lengths of time. I decided to get these neck fans for the times I am out. I bought these because of the positive reviews and for the fact that the fan units don't appear to appear to extend far out away from your neck like some others do. I thought those might get in my way when leaning over to examine things. Delivered quickly. They did fit comfortably around my size 16 1/2 neck and they were partially charged when I received them. Put them on and pushed the button. Since I was indoors, they blew cool air all around my neck. Some went on my chin and up a little on my face and around the back of my neck. Felt great! That was the low setting. The medium and high settings blew more volume but not higher up on my face or neck. The low setting isn't loud at all, you can barely hear it. It gets louder each time you increase the fan speed but it's not uncomfortable. Still, they did seem to cool me. Outside, they blow whatever temperature the ambient air is. They do cool your neck because as they blow across your skin that is moistened by sweat, the sweat evaporates, thereby cooling you. Kind of like the "swamp cooler" effect. One thing, though, the air outlets around the neck fan are on the inner, upper edge, angled upward toward your neck. If you're like me, overweight and have a neck roll, the roll will block the outlets if you raise you head or lean it left or right. I guess because this is a smaller unit.They are very light and pretty unobtrusive. The fans units are closer to my neck and do touch my chin when I look down at my feet but the fans don't get blocked. I've used them 4-5 times for about an hour each time and they are still on the original charge. ( I fully charged them shortly after trying them on). Overall, I probably should have tried one of the larger neck fans, but this seems to keep my neck and lower part of my head cool for the times I'm outside. If it really humid, hot and sunny you can still get overheated from direct sun exposure, so be careful!.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps me on hot days!
reviews.reviewText: I have a medical condition where I can't regulate my body temperature. I can't function when it gets over 78 degrees. This neck fan helps keep me cool when I'm outside in the heat. It make a noticeable difference! I like this better than the cooling towels as they are wet and don't stay cool. I also like the three settings so I can personalize the amount of airflow I need to feel cooler. It's quiet and really works well. So happy that I got it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great and looks nice
reviews.reviewText: The last one I bought from another seller was fine, but then I got this one and realized the other one was crap. This one has a much better battery life and you can actually see the battery percentage on the side. It has multiple levels to the fan and level 1 was similar to the max level on my last neck fan. This fan is great and we use it all the time when on walks down here in S. FL.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It does work somewhat
reviews.reviewText: Yes this does produce a great breeze if you are not being active. Once you start to sweat the air turns tepid. About 30 minutes into Mowing or a hike the cool breeze is not refreshing. It is a little loud when on high but not bad if you turn up your headphones. It does vibrate annoyingly when it hits your headphones when you jog. Overall I prefer my evaporation neck towel to the neck fan. Battery life is good lasts well over my 60 minute hikes. Recharge is very slow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This fan is great for warehouse workers!!!
reviews.reviewText: Honestly I give this a 10 out of 10! For the money I wasn't expecting it to be great but it deff exceeded my expectations. I work in a hot warehouse 10 hours a day in 90 to 100 degree Temps in the summer. This fan is a must have. It's light weight on your neck, you barley hear it bc it's super quiet, and the fan is pretty strong for as small as it is. It lasts about 7 hours on low and probably about 5 on high I'd say I've never really kept it on high bc you don't really need to but I highly recommend it of you need something portable to cool you off. And they even include the type c charger, it's not super long tho so what I did was went and bought a longer one and plugged it into my battery pack, slipped the battery in my pocket and wore it while it was charging so it lasted longer. So if your sonine who needs it for a long time that deff works too!Happy shopping 😃

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best value for the price
reviews.reviewText: I purchased four different neck fans, I had a small chin surgery and I was uncomfortable with the bandages and itchiness.Out of the four I got; this one is the best, even better than most expensive ones.Air blows all around the fan and not only on the front part, it is light , you cannot feel it when you’re in bed; it is not noisy.I was scared about my long hair getting caught but that was not an issue. It doesn’t make my neck itchy, no marks after using it over night, confortable designI got a black one and I am ready to get one more before they get discontinued because small electronic machines in amazon do not last much because technology grows day by day and machines get replaced or updated white fast
Pero si es un poco ruidoso
Buen precio, muy cómodo de usar, un poco alto el nivel de ruido pero se compensa con la utilidad
Doesn't work like how it LTS shown in description
Thanks got it for hot flashes, not too heavy or noisy and works great. Will be great for exercising too!
